item.description:
Folks the plan is to watch a movie in the evening and then hang out at a nearby starbucks and try to solve world issues over a cup of coffee. So who is in?

Movie - District 9 at AMC Loews Boston Common 19
Show - 5 PM

http://www.flixster.c...

District 9 has received great reviews from audience and cirtics as well and has become a must see movie for this summer. We can all meet around 4:30 in the lobby of the theater and buy our tickets there. If you wish to purchase online tickets ahead of time thats fine as well

If the weather starts going down south, our plan would follow suit and I will update everyone who rsvp's
item.name: Sunday evening hangout
